statements: SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports;
SELECT location, compliance_status FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT inspector_name, location FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT report_id, date, inspector_name FROM landfill_inspection_reports ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT report_id, location, inspector_name FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT report_id, location, inspector_name FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND inspector_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM landfill_inspection_reports GROUP BY location HAVING total_reports > 5 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT AVG(CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS INT)) AS avg_year FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports;
SELECT inspector_name, compliance_status FROM landfill_inspection_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, inspector_name, compliance_status FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT * FROM inspection_details ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, inspector_name, inspector_notes FROM inspection_details JOIN landfill_inspection_reports ON inspection_details.report_id = landfill_inspection_reports.report_id;
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT inspector_name, report_date FROM landfill_inspection_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, compliance_status FROM landfill_inspection_reports GROUP BY compliance_status;
SELECT report_id, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM landfill_inspection_reports JOIN inspection_details ON landfill_inspection_reports.report_id = inspection_details.report_id;
SELECT DISTINCT inspector_name FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports;
SELECT report_id, inspector_name, landfill_location FROM landfill_inspection_reports;
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT report_id, inspection_date, inspector_name, landfill_location FROM landfill_inspection_reports ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, inspector_name, landfill_location FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE inspector_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, landfill_location FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;

SELECT r.report_id, f.finding_description, p.photo_url FROM landfill_inspection_reports r JOIN inspection_findings f ON r.report_id = f.report_id JOIN inspection_photos p ON f.finding_id = p.finding_id;
SELECT * FROM inspection_findings WHERE severity_level = 'High' ORDER BY finding_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports, AVG(report_id) AS avg_report_id FROM landfill_inspection_reports;
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports;
SELECT report_id, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM landfill_inspection_reports;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM landfill_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT report_id, finding_description, severity_level FROM inspection_findings ORDER BY severity_level DESC;
SELECT report_id, photo_url FROM inspection_photos WHERE report_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT report_id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT report_id, inspection_date, inspector_name, compliance_status FROM landfill_inspection_reports ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM landfill_locations WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY location_name ASC;

SELECT i.inspector_name, f.finding_description, f.severity_level, r.compliance_status FROM landfill_inspection_reports r JOIN inspection_findings f ON r.report_id = f.report_id JOIN landfill_inspection_reports i ON r.report_id = i.report_id;
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, inspector_name, compliance_score FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_score > 85;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites ORDER BY site_capacity DESC;
SELECT violation_description, violation_date FROM violations WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_department = 'Environmental Services';
SELECT * FROM landfill_inspection_reports;
SELECT id, inspector_name, report_date FROM landfill_inspection_reports WHERE compliance_score > 80 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, site_location, site_capacity FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_owner = 'ABC Company' ORDER BY site_capacity DESC;

SELECT inspector_name, inspection_type, violation_description FROM violations JOIN landfill_inspection_reports ON violations.inspector_name = landfill_inspection_reports.inspector_name WHERE violation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email, inspector_phone FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_department = 'Environmental Services' ORDER BY inspector_name;
